projects.title: Acoustic Slat Wall Panels
projects.description: Perfect for recording studios, home theaters, and creative spaces. These panels are designed not only for modern style but also for function: the felt backing and precise slat spacing absorb unwanted echoes and reduce background noise. The result is a balanced, clear sound environment — ideal for music production, mixing, or simply enjoying flawless acoustics. Stylish, practical, and effective.

projects.title: Modern TV Wall Design
projects.description: A perfect blend of natural stone and elegant wood slats. The granite panel under the TV combined with vertical slat detailing creates a bold focal point that is both modern and timeless. This design adds depth, style, and a luxurious atmosphere to any living room — a statement piece that elevates your entire space.

projects.title: Modern Bedroom Accent Walls
projects.description: Bring a touch of elegance and comfort to your bedroom with slat panels combined with stone finishes. These panels not only elevate the design but also soften outside sounds, making the room more peaceful. The result is a stylish, cozy space where you can truly relax.

projects.title: Cozy & Quiet Bedroom Design
projects.description: Transform your bedroom into a peaceful retreat with elegant slat wall panels. Beyond their stylish, modern look, the panels help reduce outside noise, creating a calmer and quieter atmosphere. Combined with decorative stone accents and warm lighting, they add depth, comfort, and luxury to your personal space. A perfect balance of design and relaxation.

projects.title: Hidden Door Wall Panels
projects.description: Stylish wood panels that bring warmth and elegance to your living room while concealing a secret door. This smart design allows you to keep a clean, seamless look on the outside and a private, hidden space behind. Perfect for creating a modern accent wall with a touch of mystery and luxury.

projects.title: Illuminated Wall Panels
projects.description: A striking combination of modern wood panels and integrated LED lighting. These panels not only create a warm and stylish atmosphere but can also cleverly conceal a hidden door behind their seamless design. Perfect for living rooms, offices, or private spaces — a true blend of elegance, innovation, and functionality.

projects.title: Modern Wall Panels
projects.description: Stylish wall panels that bring elegance and warmth to your living room. The clean geometric design adds depth and character, creating a cozy and modern space where you feel comfortable and relaxed.

projects.title: Illuminated Wall Panels
projects.description: Add a bold, modern statement to your space with illuminated wood panels. The integrated LED lighting highlights the geometric design, creating a sophisticated atmosphere that's perfect for an office, home theater, or creative lounge. These panels not only elevate your interior but also set the mood with style and innovation.

projects.title: Black Venetian Plaster Fireplace Wall
projects.description: Make a statement with a sleek black Venetian plaster wall, polished to a glossy finish with subtle gray highlights. The reflective surface adds depth and drama, while the soft shimmer brings modern elegance to your living room. Behind the fireplace, it becomes the centerpiece of the space — bold, stylish, and unforgettable.

projects.title: Concrete & Panel Feature Wall
projects.description: A stunning mix of natural concrete texture, sleek wood panels, and integrated lighting. This design creates a dramatic focal point with a warm, modern feel. The contrast of raw stone-like concrete and refined panels adds both character and elegance, making the room feel bold, stylish, and one of a kind.

projects.title: Modern Living Room Wall Finish
projects.description: A sleek Venetian plaster wall that adds depth and character to your living room. The soft gray tones create a refined backdrop for your furniture, bringing a modern and elegant feel to the space. Perfect for those who want a stylish yet comfortable home atmosphere.

projects.title: Light Venetian Plaster Living Room
projects.description: This soft, light plaster finish makes the room feel open, warm, and inviting. Paired with a modern fireplace, it adds a touch of elegance without losing comfort. A perfect choice for creating a bright and cozy home atmosphere.
